ui.title: Tica Detective Agency: Number Mystery
ui.tap_to_enter_user_id: Tap to enter User ID (letters, numbers, underscore)

manual.title: 🕵️ Detective Manual 🕵️
manual.mouse_hint:
Click 'True' stamp = Answer is correct
Click 'False' stamp = Answer is wrong
manual.keyboard_hint:
Press T key or → key = Select True
Press F key or ← key = Select False
manual.magnify_hint: Magnifying Glass: Carefully observe question clues for hints!
manual.watch_hint: Pocket Watch: Add 10 seconds to time, think slowly~
manual.flash_hint: Lightbulb: Shows correct answer directly! But only three times~
manual.exp_hint:
Gain experience points by solving cases!
More accurate answers = more EXP~
manual.badge_hint:
Get S-rank evaluation to earn badges!
Each level's S-badge can be collected~

estimate.name: Estimation Power
estimate.hint: Round it up or round it down, chase the silly answers out of town!

lastDigit.name: Last Digit Tracking
lastDigit.hint: Don't mind the front, it's just a test, the final digit is the best!

parity.name: The Odd/Even Code
parity.hint: Odd times odd is an odd little prize. If an even's in the mix, an even answer will rise!

castingOutNines.name: Casting Out Nines
castingOutNines.hint: Add the digits in the sum, keep on adding 'til there's one!

carryBorrow.name: The Carry/Borrow Trap
carryBorrow.hint: When adding more, carry next door! When taking away, borrow and play!

specialDigits.name: Special Digit Fingerprint
specialDigits.hint: To check for threes and nines, here's a secret sign: Add up the digits, it works every time!

inverseOp.name: Inverse Operation Magic
inverseOp.hint: To check your math and make it true, do the opposite, it's the clue!

times11.name: Friend of 11
times11.hint: Pull the ends apart, put their sum in the heart!

errors.user_id_invalid: User ID can only contain letters, numbers and underscores

debug.confirm_reset: Are you sure you want to reset the game?
